article.headline: Starbucks launches summer menu in the U.S. that includes plant-based Impossible Breakfast Sandwich
article.body: The previous version of this story misstated where cold brew coffee with cinnamon Almondmilk foam will be available. It has been corrected. Starbucks Corp. SBUX, +0.53% said Tuesday that it will launch its summer menu in the U.S., which will include the Impossible Breakfast Sandwich. The sandwich is made with a plant-based Impossible Foods breakfast patty, fried egg, cheddar cheese and ciabatta bread. The menu also includes cold brew coffee with cinnamon or dark cocoa Almondmilk foam. Cinnamon Oatmilk foam will only be available in parts of the Midwest and California. Starbucks stock is down 14.2% for the year to date while the S&P 500 index SPX, +0.87% has fallen 3.5% for the period.
